Others: Jalen Johnson scored 29 points to lead the Atlanta Hawks to a 126-111 victory over the short-handed New Orleans Pelicans.
Brandon Ingram scored 32 points for the Pelicans, but it wasn't enough to overcome the Hawks.
Trae Young scored 23 points for Atlanta, while former Pelican Dyson Daniels added 16.
The Pelicans were without starters Dejounte Murray, CJ McCollum, and Herb Jones, along with prominent reserve Trey Murphy III.
